document_data.mainbody:
Giants bane were enchanted sling bullets created for defense against giants.
Giants bane bullets were enchanted to deal additional damage when used against giants.
Giants bane ammunition was created by halflings, defending their homes from giant raids. Over the years, these bullets were the result of many giants demise. By late 14 century DR, giants bane bullets were quite often encountered across the Sword Coast as well as the Moonsea regions of Faer√ªn.
